description: React component for a demo SMS card that sends SMS via Twilio API directly from the browser, including configuration retrieval, validation, and error handling.

methods.name: getTwilioConfig
methods.description: Retrieves Twilio configuration from environment variables.

methods.name: isLikelyE164
methods.description: Validates if a phone number string is in E.164 format.

methods.name: parseTwilioError
methods.description: Parses error response from Twilio API, fallback to text if JSON parsing fails.
